name: Elephantastic
description:
Elephantastic is a short cartoony 3D Puzzle Platformer, in which you defeat you enemies through sheer weight!

Developed in 8 weeks by first year students at the BUAS (formerly known as NHTV) Team: Design & Production:
  • Ronny Josch
  • Nick Snoeren
  • Maksim Yildirim
Art:
  • Sheila Stipnieks
  • Joan Tassov
  • Yana Tosheva
Programming:
  • Valencio Hoffman
  • Simon Renger
  • Danail Yordanov

Elephantastic uses the Unreal® Engine. Unreal® is a trademark or registered trademark of Epic Games, Inc. in the United States of America and elsewhere. Unreal® Engine, Copyright 1998 – 2018, Epic Games, Inc. All rights reserved.
